alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:33PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Madison and south central Gallatin Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 532 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Henrys Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Yellowstone, Yellowstone Village and Raynolds Pass. This includes the following highways... Highway 191 between mile markers 5 and 10, and between mile markers 31 and 38. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for south central and southwestern Montana.
